## Data frame things

```{r}

# new name so I don't mess up the old one
ak_bar_df <- ak_skookag_mat

# convert tax_table to data frame
ak_tax_table_df <- as.data.frame(tax_table(unrarefied_physeq))

# make asv rownames into column
ak_tax_table_df <- ak_tax_table_df %>% rownames_to_column('ASV')

# where family = Paraglomerales, change to Glomeromycotina
ak_tax_table_df$Family <- gsub("Paraglomerales", "Glomeromycotina", ak_tax_table_df$Family)


```



## Unique Kolea

```{r}

# isolate asvs unique to chosen host
ak_unique_kolea_asvs <- rownames(ak_bar_df)[ak_bar_df$`Kolea root`!=0 &
                                            ak_bar_df$`Grass root`==0 &
                                            ak_bar_df$`Koa root`==0 &
                                            ak_bar_df$`Akala root`==0 &
                                            ak_bar_df$`Ohia root`==0 &
                                            ak_bar_df$`Olapa root`==0 &
                                            ak_bar_df$Soil==0]

# make new ak df with only unique host asvs
ak_unique_kolea_df <- ak_bar_df[rownames(ak_bar_df) %in% ak_unique_kolea_asvs,]

# make asv rownames into a column
ak_unique_kolea_df <- ak_unique_kolea_df %>% rownames_to_column('ASV')

# make a new df with asv names and host sample asv counts as columns
ak_kolea_only_df <- ak_unique_kolea_df %>% select(ASV, `Kolea root`)

# take sum of all unique host sample sequences
ak_kolea_sum <- sum(ak_bar_df$`Kolea root`)

# make new relative abundance column by dividing unique count by total
ak_kolea_only_df <- ak_kolea_only_df %>% mutate(rel_abun = ((`Kolea root` / ak_kolea_sum) * 100))

# make new column taking family from tax_table where asv names match in both dfs
ak_kolea_only_df$family <- ak_tax_table_df$Family[match(ak_kolea_only_df$ASV, ak_tax_table_df$ASV)]

# make new column with host name filling all cells
ak_kolea_only_df$Sample <- rep("Kolea root", nrow(ak_kolea_only_df))

# make new column with ASV total filling all cells
ak_kolea_only_df$Total <- rep(sum(ak_kolea_only_df$`Kolea root`), nrow(ak_kolea_only_df))

# change host colname for future rbind
colnames(ak_kolea_only_df)[2] <- "Count"


```

## rbind

```{r}

ak_total_rbind <- do.call("rbind", list(ak_kolea_only_df,
                                        ak_grass_only_df,
                                        ak_koa_only_df,
                                        ak_akala_only_df,
                                        ak_ohia_only_df,
                                        ak_olapa_only_df,
                                        ak_soil_only_df))

ak_total_rbind <- na.omit(ak_total_rbind)


## Getting ASV counts for bar labels

# make a copy
ak_total_rbind_sums <- ak_total_rbind

# detach plyr if using. summarise() in plyr does something different
ak_total_rbind_sums <- ak_total_rbind_sums %>% group_by(Sample) %>% summarise(count=length(ASV), abund=sum(rel_abun))


```



## Plot

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ak_unique_bar <- ggplot(ak_total_rbind, aes(x=Sample, fill=family, y=rel_abun)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity", position="stack") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle=90, size=14, colour="black", vjust=0.5, hjust=1, face="bold"), panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank(), panel.background=element_blank(),
        axis.line = element_line(colour="gray"),
        axis.title.y = element_text(size=16, face="bold"),
        legend.title = element_text(size=16, face="bold"),
        legend.text = element_text(size=12, face="bold", colour="black"),
        axis.text.y = element_text(colour="black", size=12, face="bold")) +
  ylim(0,8) +
  theme(plot.margin = unit(c(1,1,1,1), "cm")) +
  labs(x = "", y = "Relative Abundance (%)", fill="Family") +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Spectral") +
  geom_text(data=ak_total_rbind_sums, aes(x=Sample, y=abund, label=count), inherit.aes = F, vjust=-1)

```
